description:
Ever wonder how to improve your SEO skills?. Learn and master the SEO that works: SEO 2.0, based on real cases, with actionable tips and tricks.

More than 16 videos, 4 ebooks, and many PDF to become a SEO hero.

At the end of the course you will be able to:

- Apply the concept of SEO 2.0 to your site

- Avoid the most dangerous SEO mistake

- Use social media and content to improve your SEO

- Improve your SEO on-site

- Use actionable tactics to improve your rankings

- Increase traffic and sales

I've been working on SEO projects since 1997, for more than 1,200 companies around the world. I'll share with you all my SEO secrets and I will explain why traditional SEO is obsolete.

The spanish version of this course has more than 2,000 students, and more than 40 "5" stars reviews
title: From SEO to SEO 2.0
